Changes:
- Nova's Discovery description now lists the current targets.
- Purchasing chests for gems/event tokens now re-selects the same quantity after buying.
- Various bug fixes.

Changes:
- Nova's Discovery description now lists the current targets.
- Purchasing chests for gems/event tokens now re-selects the same quantity after buying.
- Various bug fixes.

- Various bug fixes.

Changes:
- Nova's Discovery description now lists the current targets.
- Purchasing chests for gems/event tokens now re-selects the same quantity after buying.
- Various bug fixes.

Changes:
- Add the text "XP" to the modron XP bar
- Added a display "Calculating" on instances while the background is running.
- If you click on the core button and it is empty it now pops up the select a core widget.
- Added tooltips to core preview.
- Updated the description of Delina's ultimate ability to make its effect more clear
- Nova's Discovery description now list's the current targets.



Features:
- Added two new adventures in the Waterdeep: Dragon Heist campaign. Both adventures come with one variant which is playable in all three patrons.
- Added data for the Founder's Day event, starting today at noon PDT. You will be able to recruit Freely, the Halfling Bard/Warlock, in addition to previous years' Champions Walnut and Deekin.

- Added data for the Midsummer event, starting today at noon PDT. You will be able to recruit Beadle & Grimm, two powerful Champions in one, in addition to previous years' Champions Xander and Shandie.


Fixes:
- Fixed Street Wars buff box persisting

- Fixed Never Split the Party placing newly purchased Champions in the formation
- Fixed Form Ranks variant when using a Patron
- Fixed an issue that sometimes caused offline progress to freeze.
- Fixed the alignment of the auto progress circles arrows and numbers on the instance preview screen
- Green auto progress circle doesn't appear correctly at higher resolutions?
- Fixed familiars from a party that was just used being unavailable if that party is at the map
- Fixed additional champions not showing on the bench until seat 2 is purchased.
- Fixed an issue where reset failed when the background party resets before your current party.
- Fixed an issue where If you hover the rewards on the adventure description of split the party it talks about divine favor.
- Fixed an issue where SoftResetReminderDialog mentioned divine favor on split the party adventure
- Fixed the strong core buff that read "No Description"
- Fixed tooltips of the automation core ending up duplicated.
- Fixed tooltips for the favor you will get for completing split the party on the adventure details dialog show for the previous adventure you had active.
- Fixed masking issues on the chest open dialog if opened from the modron dialog
- Fixed an off by one error preventing buying component upgrades with the exact amount
- Fixed disabled formations still picking specializations
- Fixed when you scroll the Modron FAQ it scrolls the grid area behind it
- Fixed exception on load causing offline progress to get stuck
- Fixed Briv being able to skip the party past removal areas on Spilt the Party
- Fixed sometimes opening modron chests results in the icons on the multi-open screen being off to the right
- Fixed Dinosuar Racing failing immediately.
- Fixed a set of variant rules not working correctly
- Fixed Beadle & Grimm not being available for certain game rules (Patron rules)
- Fixed collection item layout breaking sometimes when graphics aren't preloaded

- Freely's Unlucky For Them bonus now properly displaying in the description of Luck of Yondalla
- Made it impossible to receive multiple "You have a new response to your support ticket waiting to be read!" notifications about the same support ticket in the same session.
- Fixed escorts getting removed from the formation and blocking slots
- Added two new adventures to the Descent into Avernus campaign, including one variant each which can be attempted with all three existing patrons.
- Fixed Briv's Unnatural Haste double awarding loot on the client side
- Fixed Hero's Entourage variant not removing Champions when Minsc is moved
- Fixed Split the Party not removing restriction overlays from Champions
- Fixed Form Ranks not checking variant restrictions properly
- Fixed Offline Progress credit for Patron Challenges and Freely's Adventurous Tale
- Fixed an error causing users to not be able to load the game on a certain adventure

Changes:
- Add the text "XP" to the modron XP bar
- Added a display "Calculating" on instances while the background is running.
- If you click on the core button and it is empty it now pops up the select a core widget.
- Added tooltips to core preview.
- Updated the description of Delina's ultimate ability to make its effect more clear
- Nova's Discovery description now list's the current targets.
